name: imageGetEXIFTag
description: Retrieves the specified EXIF tag in an image.

params.name: name
params.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: tagName
params.description: The EXIF tag name to be returned.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: This example shows how to retrieve one element from the EXIF information associated with an image.
examples.code:
<!--- Create a ColdFusion image from an existing JPEG file. ---> 
 <cfimage source="../cfdocs/images/artgallery/paul05.jpg" name="myImage"> 
 <!--- Retrieve the name of the software application used to create the original image. ---> 
 <cfset data = imageGetEXIFTag(myImage,"software")> 
 <!--- Display the name of the software. ---> 
 <cfdump var="#data#">

examples.title: Using getEXIFTag member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Extract model of camera used for image on exiv sample page (http://www.exiv2.org/sample.html)
